pages.text: $(#630000)The Marrow Chunk is a Guandao Blade Material formed from hardened bone marrow from an Incomplete Form. The blade it creates can only affect parasites up to the Assimilated/Feral tier.
$(#630000)It can be created by obtaining the drops of an Incomplete Form with a Factory. Like other special parasite drops obtained this way, a parasite dying will not produce it.
$(#630000)This material is superceded by the Malformed Bone.
